title: 608. Origins of Joe Burrow's Success & Best College Coaches for NFL Jobs
itunes:title: 608. Origins of Joe Burrow's Success & Best College Coaches for NFL Jobs
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. The pair are joined by college football reporter and insider Bruce Feldman as he discusses his new book "Flip the Script" on the 2019 national champion LSU football team, tells stories of former LSU QB Joe Burrow, explains the influence of former LSU passing game coordinator and wide receivers coach Joe Brady, and does a deep dive on the NFL talent from the team (:14). To wrap up the show, the guys play a game where they draft college coaches for NFL franchises (27:05).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
